original_text: She does not take care of her babies, as if they did not belong to her. She does not worry that all her work might be useless. She does not take care of her babies, as if they did not belong to her. She does not worry that all her work might be useless. She does not take care of her babies,
korean_text: 그 새끼에게 모질게 대함이 제 새끼가 아닌 것처럼 하며 그 고생한 것이 헛되게 될지라도 두려워하지 아니하나니
